<!-- This form is for bug reports and feature requests ONLY! 

If you're looking for help check [Stack Overflow](https://stackoverflow.com/questions/tagged/kubernetes) and the [troubleshooting guide](https://kubernetes.io/docs/tasks/debug-application-cluster/troubleshooting/).
-->

**Is this a BUG REPORT or FEATURE REQUEST?**:

/kind bug

**What happened**:
Pod creation doesn't finish due to the following error. If the directory doesn't exist it will be created instead of returning error.
```
E0918 17:02:33.010764   47970 nestedpendingoperations.go:264] Operation for "\"kubernetes.io/fc/[wwn]\"" failed. No retries permitted until 2017-09-18 17:02:33.510731259 -0400 EDT (durationBeforeRetry 500ms). Error: MountVolume.WaitForAttach failed for volume "pv0001" (UniqueName: "kubernetes.io/fc/[wwn]") pod "nginx-pod1" (UID: "ae61367d-9cb4-11e7-886d-f8bc12550954") : Heuristic determination of mount point failed:stat /var/lib/kubelet/plugins/kubernetes.io/fc/<wwn>-lun-0: no such file or directory 
I0918 17:02:33.576630   47970 reconciler.go:257] operationExecutor.MountVolume started for volume "pv0001" (UniqueName: "kubernetes.io/fc/[wwn]") pod "nginx-pod1" (UID: "ae61367d-9cb4-11e7-886d-f8bc12550954")  
```

**What you expected to happen**:

Pod with FC volume works properly.

**How to reproduce it (as minimally and precisely as possible)**:

- Clean up under the "/var/lib/kubelet/plugins"
- Create a Pod with FC volume

**Environment**:
- Kubernetes version (use `kubectl version`):
```
Client Version: version.Info{Major:"1", Minor:"9+", GitVersion:"v1.9.0-alpha.0.723+8ca1d9f19ba2c7-dirty", GitCommit:"8ca1d9f19ba2c75dfbca058ecfeb11d4b39d9e9f", GitTreeState:"dirty", BuildDate:"2017-09-18T18:00:44Z", GoVersion:"go1.8.3", Compiler:"gc", Platform:"linux/amd64"}
Server Version: version.Info{Major:"1", Minor:"9+", GitVersion:"v1.9.0-alpha.0.723+8ca1d9f19ba2c7-dirty", GitCommit:"8ca1d9f19ba2c75dfbca058ecfeb11d4b39d9e9f", GitTreeState:"dirty", BuildDate:"2017-09-18T21:00:48Z", GoVersion:"go1.8.3", Compiler:"gc", Platform:"linux/amd64"}
```
- Install tools: local-up-cluster.sh

/cc @rootfs @jsafrane
